alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 1:21AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Chicot, eastern Ashley, western Washington and western Bolivar Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 121 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Kelso to near Montrose. Movement was northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rosedale around 130 AM CDT. Gunnison, Lamont and Winterville around 140 AM CDT. Scott around 145 AM CDT. Benoit around 150 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Beulah and Halley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern and west central Mississippi.
